name: Skin Birds
description:
Pull finger-guns 👉 in front of your webcam, we'll track your hands and you'll fire bullets from your fingers.

This game is  experimental, so if it works on your computer, please let us know! 

Performance Tip: On windows click the select box that appears at the bottom of the screen to decrease the lag

Your index finger is the barrel and your thumb is the hammer. Bring your thumb down to fire and raise it reload. Advanced moves: dual-weld or bring in another player (one finger-gun each).

Use your virtual firearms to blast the Skin Birds out of the sky as fast as you can. Become the highest ranked finger-slinger in the world.

Requirements:

* A desktop or laptop with a GPU

* Chrome (does not work in Firefox)

* Webcam

Credits

* Game/Engine Foxdog Studios (Lloyd Henning/Peter Sutton)

* Music/SFX Alex Marczak

Tech

* Uses Google's Media Pipe  for hand tracking
